column2: Removals from the atmosphere due to afforestation (CO2e/yr, megatonnes)
column3: Total emissions due to deforestation (CO2e/yr, megatonnes)
column4: Total net emissions or removals to the atmosphere, all causes (CO2e/yr, megatonnes)
column5: Net emissions or removals due to natural disturbances (CO2e/yr, megatonnes)
column6: Net emissions or removals due to human forest management activities and from harvested wood products (CO2e/yr, megatonnes)
